data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Benguet, Philippines to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Benguet, Philippines
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 62,169 believers in Benguet against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Benguet, Philippines.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Benguet, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Manobo, Umayamnon people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Benguet. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Benguet
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.section_summary:
the state of Benguet, Philippines has a population of 446,300.

We estimate Benguet has 62,169 people who might know Jesus, 343,809 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 40,322 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Benguet that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.
